thread.title: Manchester United outcast Victor Valdes open to Newcastle switch
thread.title_full: Manchester United outcast Victor Valdes open to Newcastle switch

title: Manchester United outcast Victor Valdes open to Newcastle switch
text: Manchester United outcast Victor Valdes open to Newcastle switch Wednesday, 14 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) Victor Valdes is open to a switch to Newcastle to fill the void left by injured 'keeper Tim Krul. Manchester United’s Victor Valdes is considering a move to Newcastle United amid the Tyneside club’s interest in the goalkeeper Football FanCast 6 hours ago - Sports Man Utd duo could give LVG transfer headache... Metro.co.uk 12 hours ago - Sports The former Barcelona goalkeeper has been effectively 'exiled' at Old Trafford Independent 22 hours ago - Sports Newcastle United are ready to make a shock move for Manchester United goalkeeper Victor Valdes, according to the Daily Star. […] SoccerNews.com 22 hours ago - Sports This would be smart business by Newcastle. Metro.co.uk 1 day ago - Sports Newcastle United are looking to sign out-of-favour Manchester United goalkeeper Victor Valdes to replace injured star Tim Krul Football FanCast 1 day ago - Sports Also reported by • Daily Star • SoccerNews.com Victor Valdes remains desperate to leave Manchester United after his failed summer transfer to Besiktas thanks to his outcast status under Louis van Gaal Football FanCast 6 days ago - Sports Can't help but feel sorry for him...
